title-group.article-title: STABILIZED FEM FOR CONVECTION-DIFFUSION PROBLEMS ON LAYER-ADAPTED MESHES

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2009 AMSS, Chinese Academy of Sciences

abstract.p: The application of a standard Galerkin finite element method for convection-diffusion problems leads to oscillations in the discrete solution, therefore stabilization seems to be necessary. We discuss several recent stabilization methods, especially its combination with a Galerkin method on layer-adapted meshes. Supercloseness results obtained allow an improvement of the discrete solution using recovery techniques.
